channel.title: Postgresql on Chiching's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on Chiching's Notes

item.title: PostgreSQL Backup
item.description: PG backups 图片来自网络 auto backup on windows @echo off @setlocal enableextensions @cd /d "%~dp0" SET PGPATH=E:\PostgreSQL\9.6\bin\ SET BACKUP_FILE_PATH=G:\db_backup\ SET DB_NAME=klt_eis SET DBUSR=kltpg SET PGPASSWORD=klt.pgpwd FOR /F "TOKENS=1,2,3 DELIMS=/ " %%i IN ('DATE /T') DO SET d=%%i-%%j-%%k FOR /F "TOKENS=1,2,3 DELIMS=: " %%i IN ('TIME /T') DO SET t=%%i%%j%%k SET DBDUMP=%DB_NAME%_%d%_%t%.sql @ECHO OFF %PGPATH%pg_dump -h localhost -p 5432 -U %DBUSR% %DB_NAME% > %BACKUP_FILE_PATH%%DBDUMP% echo Backup Complete %BACKUP_FILE_PATH%%DBDUMP% pause retore psql -Uusername < filename dbname psql -Uusername -f filename dbname backup a table to file or load data into table COPY mis_user (name, account_number) TO ‘e:/employee.

item.title: PostgreSQL miscellaneous
item.description: aggregate function coalesce(field, 0) means if field is null, return 0
